ModMetaData.name: Thrones plus
ModMetaData.author: Lumi
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2V1SypC.png[/img] DISCLAIMER: This mod Requires the Royalty DLC to work properly.
Tired of always having the same thrones? This mod adds new thrones and Grand thrones with a small flip in the design.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2UWpDYC.png[/img]
[b]17/11/2020[/b] - Release
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GEK78U6.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/EX4m6A7.png[/img]
3 Thrones and 3 Grand Thrones.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/E4lOJ6X.png[/img]
Any suggestions or necessary changes leave a comment down below.
